content.html: I Loved my husband very much. He developed a gambling disorder after receiving 'free bets' whilst he had been furloughed. 4 months later, he took his own life. Please help by ✍&RT #LukesLaw petition. Help it reach 100k for Luke. 💙💙💙 #safergambling 🙏 petition.parliament.uk/petitions/5878…
content.value:
I Loved my husband very much. He developed a gambling disorder after receiving 'free bets' whilst he had been furloughed. 4 months later, he took his own life. Please help by ✍&RT #LukesLaw petition. Help it reach 100k for Luke. 💙💙💙 #safergambling 🙏
